articles.title: Indigenous river campaigner from Peru wins prestigious Goldman prize
articles.description: Mari Luz Canaquiri Murayari led a successful legal battle to protect the Marañon River in the Peruvian Amazon
articles.content: An Indigenous campaigner and women’s leader from the Peruvian Amazon has been awarded the prestigious Goldman prize for environmental activists, after leading a successful legal campaign that led to the river where her people, the Kukama, live being ... [4709 chars]

articles.title: Sonic Prime Complete Series Steelbook Preorders Are Steeply Discounted At Amazon
articles.description: All three seasons of Netflix's animated Sonic the Hedgehog series will be available in one handsome Blu-ray edition on June 24.
articles.content: Sonic fans can save big on preorders for the upcoming Blu-ray release of Sonic Prime: The Complete Series Steelbook Edition. Preorders initially opened last week with a $50 MSRP, but now Amazon and Walmart are offering over 30% off, dropping the pric... [3491 chars]

articles.title: Best-selling dog harness with nearly 200,000 reviews at Amazon Australia: Rabbitgoo
articles.description: ‘The size was perfect and quality of the product was awesome.’
articles.content:
Any dog owner will know just how important getting the right harness is for your pet.
